description:
*** Christmas Sale %50 off! *** 

Your desktop or laptop computer has the ability to automatically cycle through wallpapers, and now your TouchPad does too. Switcharoo adds functionality to your tablet that will cycle through over 500 wallpaper images in 12 different styles or categories. Pick one or more image category from abstract or architecture to textures and transportation.

And here is a nifty thing: All the images are included in the app. No need to worry about WIFI or cell signal so an image can be downloaded from a server. No need to go find high-quality backgrounds. All the wallpapers that are included are optimized and customized specifically for the TouchPad. While you cannot add your own images (that will come in a later version) every image is the highest quality. If you want to try this app first, go search for Wallpaper Switcharoo Lite.
